tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE music_therapists (
    therapist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    therapist_name TEXT,
    qualification TEXT,
    certification TEXT,
    training TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE therapists (
  therapist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  therapist_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  certification_id INT UNIQUE,
  qualification VARCHAR(100),
  training_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE certifications (
  certification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  certification_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  organization VARCHAR(100),
  issuing_date DATE,
  expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE qualifications (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    therapist_id INT,
    qualification_name VARCHAR(100),
    institution_name VARCHAR(150),
    completion_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE certifications (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    therapist_id INT,
    certification_name VARCHAR(100),
    issuing_organization VARCHAR(150),
    issue_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE training (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    therapist_id INT,
    training_course VARCHAR(100),
    training_provider VARCHAR(150),
    duration_hours INT
);

CREATE TABLE music_therapists (
    therapist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    therapist_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    qualification VARCHAR(100),
    certification VARCHAR(100),
    training_duration INT
);
